page.title: 19ATTITUDES(continued)
page.content: We also asked the farmers whether they had complaints about the smells. They said no but the pig farm does, especially when they are mucking out and spreading. We also wanted to know about the advantages and disadvantages of living in that area. The people said that the advantages were that the area was Greenbelt- that means that it can' t be built on. The disadvantages are that it is a long way to travel to Gloucester. The people that live in that area also said that they don't mind there not being any shops nearby because of the new Tesco's at Quedgeley but some people would like a small village shop or a van that comes around once a week. Most of them agree that they don't like the new housing estates, but they don't mind them, as long as
